unnormalised: Hey, sports fans! Athlete biographies are my jam. Just finished reading about Dhyan Chand - what a legend! Remember "Chak De! India"? Gave me similar feels. Knowing their struggles, like training in Allahabad's heat or raising Rs. 100000 for kit makes their wins at the Asian Games or 20 km runs even sweeter.
normalised: Hey, sports fans! Athlete biographies are my jam. Just finished reading about Dhyan Chand - what a legend! Remember "Chak De! India"? Gave me similar feels. Knowing their struggles, like training in Allahabad's heat or raising rupee one hundred thousand for kit makes their wins at the Asian Games or twenty kilometer runs even sweeter.
